markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Look but Don't Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3959) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 39</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

Many flowers are beautiful to look upon but deadly to touch—and you're one of them. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or damages you with a melee weapon without the [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) trait or with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack takes 3d6 poison damage.
name: Look but Don't Touch
